author: mratsim
content: Can't we just use an arbitrary byte to create domain separation?

author: ralexstokes
content: the main criteria is how large the trusted setup needs to be, e.g. we can do something smaller for DAS and i think Verkle trees -- assuming we can do a ceremony w/ say 2^15 elements then that setup can be re-used in each of the applications we care about; and it would make sense to have domain separation like <@!570268431522201601> says
